channel.title: Utorrent Portforwarding
channel.description:
Okay, so for a while I have been trying to develop my own server without portforwarding through the router and using the simpler way using Utorrent but no one seems to be able to access the server. The only problem I can properly see with it is when I open up Utorrent I get this message.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/idbou9.jpg[/img]
If anyone could help me I would be very greatful.

item.title: Utorrent Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

First of all you lost the password your screwed if your leaching cuse u cant reset it and if its your router look for the reset button. also if u didnt set a password leave the password blank when it asks for it

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Darthax Darthax
item.description:
@Darthax wrote:

to get the password off your router look for the little reset butten on the router then go look upo defalt pass word for your router on google

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Thing is there is already a password set for the router i’m just not sure what it is. Okay i’ve turned off the ‘Add Windows Firewall exception’ on Utorrent and that seems to have fixed that problem but I seem to also be getting this message.

213pt3b.jpg843×21

I do: Run server.bat, Open up the No-Ip DUC and then open up Utorrent and I get that message.

Read full topic

item.title: Utorrent Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Darthax Darthax
item.description:
@Darthax wrote:

ok for you linksys router go to google and look for the default password for your router i thingk it’s user password or admin admin or root root : all eww utorent pf and also for you to use utorent as pf all you need to do is turn off your fire wall u have to do the same with hamachi that should work if not pm me and ill help you some more

Read full topic

just let you know the truth Utorrent dont work because i tryed that and my server didn’t work so i had to do the real portforwarding that Utorrent is a full of shit. if i was u i would do the real portforwarding if u dont know pass plz tell me the router u got and i might help u.

item.title: Utorrent Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

The thing is I have all the boxes ticked for letting Utorrent pass through so i’m not really sure why it isn’t working. Also I can’t use the router because I don’t have the password lol. Here are the boxes I have checked for Utorrent to pass through, if you can think of any more I need checked then please say.


Read full topic
